title: (x) Judy Cormier - (similar to) Century Cd Bd {Mark S}
author: Eduardo Omine

comments.content: It's very close to Century Bold Condensed, but little details here and there don't match precisely. What was this from?

Font Bureau's [Century](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141242/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-century/centuryfb-boldcondensed/testdrive.html?s=JUDY%20CORMIER&p=96) (Bold Condensed) seems closer, but also not a perfect match.
